DOC.brief_summary: This randomized cross-over study was designed to investigate the effects of legume enriched diet consumption on cardiovascular risk factors among first degree relatives of diabetic patients.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Legume Intake on Cardiovascular Risk Factors Among Adults at Risk for Diabetes
DOC.criteria: subjects aged more than 30 years no history of chronic diseases no use of blood glucose lowering drugs be wiling to participate to study do not follow study protocol incidence of chronic diseases during the study to start use of blood glucose lowering drugs or to change dose and type of current medications
